com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl

Class RestfulJsonMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.ObjectMapper
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.RestfulMapper
        • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl.RestfulJsonMapper

  • public class RestfulJsonMapper
extends RestfulMapper

    This implementation of RestfulMapper provides methods to map domain models to RESTful web service resources for JSON message types.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 08/05/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

      • mapModel

        public RestfulStringModelMap mapModel(java.lang.Object model)
                               throws InvalidMappingException,
                                      ModelConfigurationException
        Description copied from class: ObjectMapper
        Returns a ModelMap object containing persistent model data values mapped to their respective columns.
        Specified by:
        mapModel in class RestfulMapper
        Parameters:
        model - the Object to map
        Returns:
        ModelMap with the entity's persistent fields mapped to their columns
        Throws:
        InvalidMappingException - if a type cannot be mapped
        ModelConfigurationException - if the model is configured incorrectly

      • registerTypeAdapter

        public <T> void registerTypeAdapter(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                           TypeAdapter<T> adapter)
        Description copied from class: ObjectMapper
        Registers the given TypeAdapter for the specified Class with this SqliteMapper instance. The TypeAdapter allows a Field of this type to be mapped to a database column. Registering a TypeAdapter for a Class which already has a TypeAdapter registered for it will result in the previous TypeAdapter being overridden.
        Specified by:
        registerTypeAdapter in class ObjectMapper
        Parameters:
        type - the Class this TypeAdapter is for
        adapter - the TypeAdapter to register

      • getRegisteredTypeAdapters

        Description copied from class: ObjectMapper
        Returns a Map containing all TypeAdapter instances registered with this ObjectMapper and the Class instances in which they are registered for.
        Specified by:
        getRegisteredTypeAdapters in class ObjectMapper
        Returns:
        {@code Map, TypeAdapter>
